# Chicago Coding Systems

> Chicago Coding Systems has specialized in the research, development, and manufacturing of marking, coding, and labeling technologies for over 60 years. Their knowledge and experience allow them to meet customer needs by providing quality service and products.

Based in St. Charles, Illinois, Chicago Coding Systems brings over 60 years of experience in custom solutions for product marking & coding, labeling, and scanning for modern manufacturing. They offer a 4-hour response guarantee for support services.

## Pages
[Home](https://MRIIOT.github.io/chicagocodingsystemsdotcom/): Home page featuring custom solutions, services overview, and client testimonials.
[About](https://MRIIOT.github.io/chicagocodingsystemsdotcom/about.html): Learn about Chicago Coding Systems' 60+ year history, values, and mission.
[Services](https://MRIIOT.github.io/chicagocodingsystemsdotcom/services.html): Explore detailed support, contract labeling, printing, inventory management, and consulting services.
[Solutions](https://MRIIOT.github.io/chicagocodingsystemsdotcom/solutions.html): Discover expertise in marking, coding, labeling, scanning, software integration, and material handling for various industries.
[Process](https://MRIIOT.github.io/chicagocodingsystemsdotcom/process.html): Understand their four-step methodology: Assessment, Design, Implementation, and Support.
[Contact](https://MRIIOT.github.io/chicagocodingsystemsdotcom/contact.html): Get in touch for inquiries, with phone and email options.
[Free Production Assessment](https://MRIIOT.github.io/chicagocodingsystemsdotcom/audit.html): Request a complimentary assessment to maximize production efficiency.
